fields.name: anim
fields.description: Animation - this is the strip that plays a bunch of times

fields.name: count
fields.description: Count - how many to play total

fields.name: concurrent
fields.description: Concurrent count - how many play at once

fields.name: span
fields.description: Span - each anim will appear in an n x n area around target

fields.name: granularity
fields.description: Granularity - each anim will appear on an n by n grid of this size

fields.name: sound
fields.description: Sound effect - plays with the animation in battle only

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
